page.title: 11A Mackie Academy School Day
page.content: The school day starts at 08:55 with registration. This lasts ten minutes. Then there are 6*20 minute modules of classes before interval. Interval is 11:05 to 11:20 and the tuckshop is busy then. Favourite buys are Mars bars, Yorkie bars, Crisps, Coca Cola and Fanta. After interval there are 4*20 minute modules of lessons. Lunch is 12:40 to 13:50. Many school lunches are eaten in the three dinning halls. Some pupils bring a packed lunch of sandwiches, fruit and yoghurt (and crisps!) and eat this around the school. Some pupils go in to Stonehaven town and buy pies or local sausage rolls from the local bakers' shop. After lunch there are rather a lot of food wrappers lying around (tin cans, plastic bottles, paper bags, plastic bags, cardboard cartons and plastic film) from 13:50 to 13:55
